summary: This is a forwarded email from July 24, 2019, regarding a media report about Jeffrey Epstein being attacked or attempting to hurt himself. The sender, a US Attorney's Office employee, informs colleagues about an upcoming NBC story and notes they declined to comment.

persons.name: Margolin, James
persons.role: Contractor at US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS)
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (Cc) in the email chain regarding the Epstein media report.

persons.name: Blase, Nicholas
persons.role: Employee at US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS)
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (Cc) in the email chain regarding the Epstein media report.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the email and the reported incident where he was either attacked or attempted to hurt himself.

events.title: Report of Epstein Incident
events.description: NBC 4 reports that Jeffrey Epstein was either attacked or attempted to hurt himself, with national NBC planning to pick up the story.

keyFacts: An email from July 24, 2019, discusses a media report about Jeffrey Epstein being attacked or attempting to hurt himself.
The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was aware of the upcoming NBC story and declined to comment.
The email indicates coordination within the US Attorney's Office regarding media inquiries about Epstein's status.
